global.title: <%= baseName %>
global.browsehappy: 您目前使用過於老舊的瀏覽器, 建議您升級瀏覽器讓您有更佳的上網體驗.

entities.additionalEntity: JHipster will add additional entities here (do not translate!)

info.authenticated:
如果您要登入, 您可以使用預設帳號:
- 管理者 (帳號="admin"與密碼="admin")
- 使用者 (帳號="user"與密碼="user").
info.register: 您還沒有帳號？註冊一個新帳號

error.dontmatch: 您輸入的密碼與密碼確認不符合!

newpassword.minlength: 您的密碼長度至少要有5個字元
newpassword.maxlength: 您的密碼長度不能超過50個字元

confirmpassword.required: 您的密碼確認是必填欄位.
confirmpassword.minlength: 您的密碼確認長度至少要有5個字元
confirmpassword.maxlength: 您的密碼確認長度不能超過50個字元

email.required: 您的電子郵件是必填欄位.
email.invalid: 您的電子郵件格式格式不正確.
email.minlength: 您的電子郵件長度至少要有5個字元
email.maxlength: 您的電子郵件長度不能超過50個字元

validation.minlength: This field is required to be at least {{min}} characters.
validation.maxlength: This field cannot be longer than {{max}} characters.
validation.min: This field should be more than {{min}}.
validation.max: This field cannot be more than {{max}}.
validation.minbytes: This field should be more than {{min}} bytes.
validation.maxbytes: This field cannot be more than {{max}} bytes.
validation.number: This field should be a number.
validation.datetimelocal: This field should be a date and time.
